Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::GetProductRequest

Request message for the GetProduct method.

Methods

#name

#name => ::String
Returns
Type Description
::String

Required. Resource name of the Product to get.

Format is: projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOC_ID/products/PRODUCT_ID

Returns

::String
